Regole primitive

prim_refl_conv

term -> thm

\(\frac{`t`}{\vdash\ t = t}\)

prim_beta_conv

term -> thm

\(\frac{`(\lambda x.\ t)\ s`}{\vdash\ (\lambda x.\ t)\ s = t[s/x] }\)

prim_mk_comb_rule

thm -> thm -> thm

\(\frac{A1\ \vdash\ f1 = f2\ A2 \vdash\ t1 = t2}{ A1\ \cup\ A2\ \vdash\ f1\ t1 = f2\ t2 }\)
